title: Bard Secret Passive with Draven??
body:
So, me and a friend were duoing bot lane, he was Draven ADC, and we noticed a small etched face of Bard just above the bot lane river bush.

It lit up when he first got near it, but we weren't sure if we saw what we think we saw, went into a custom game, played different champions, and the face did not light up.
Tried it again as Draven, and sure enough, it did light up.

Is this some kind of teaser for a Secret Passive with Draven? Or something along those lines possibly.

replies.body: I thought Bard's secret passive was to bugsplat people when he picks up charms

The icon was a teaser for Bard.

It has been on the rift for a while now and frankly I am surprised you haven't heard about it or seen it yet.

The real question is, why are you not playing Draven mid for freelo? You outpoke APC's, you outdamage them, you outsustain them, draven at level 11 will chunk an adc for 60% of their health with a crit Q. Real talk, much OP.
There are a total of 3 bard icons on the map. Each time a different one lightsup
it also lights up with shaco, ahri, riven and thresh walk near them
Yeah don't think so, I have seen it happen with other characters.
I don't play Draven, and I've seen the one at the top lane light up. So no.
